Header.paragraph: We are a Mumbai-based law firm providing legal services exclusively for startups.

About.paragraph: To give you personalized attention and cater to your needs, we are a team of individuals who will be dedicated day and night. Our legal passion and experience in law firms has driven us to start this and make it big by helping clients to get what they have come for. Our mission is to be a fast paced and work systematically. We want to be the top advisory and consultancy firms and we strongly believe that your trust in us will help us reach great heights. While IPR and general corporate and advisory services has been the core of the Firmâ€™s practice, we have actively diversified our spectrum of service offerings, with high-caliber individuals with experience across practice areas and industry sectors.

Services.name: General Advisory Services
text: General Counselling and Advisory on Legal Issues
Will and Probate, Succession/Legal Heir Certificates
Drafting and Vetting of Legal Documents

Team.name: Hi, this is Hiloni Chheda
Team.bio: An enthusiastic and professional advocate currently pursuing masters in corporate law with variety of experience in IPR, Corporate law, Property Law, IBC, Testamentary matters and drafting & vetting of various legal documents.

Team.name: Hi, this is Sanya Jhaveri
Team.bio: She is a Pharmacy and Law graduate. She has great zeal for IP and tax laws and has filed plenty of trademarks and copyrights in India and the US.
